verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician <WH5329> on Neginoth, <WH5058> A Psalm <WH4210> or Song <WH7892> of Asaph. <WH623> In Judah <WH3063> is God <WH430> known: <WH3045> his name <WH8034> is great <WH1419> in Israel. <WH3478>
In Salem <WH8004> also is his tabernacle, <WH5520> and his dwelling <WH4585> place in Zion. <WH6726>
There <WH8033> broke <WH7665> he the arrows <WH7565> of the bow, <WH7198> the shield, <WH4043> and the sword, <WH2719> and the battle. <WH4421> Selah. <WH5542>
You are more glorious <WH215> and excellent <WH117> than the mountains <WH2042> of prey. <WH2964>
The stouthearted <WH47> <WH3820> are spoiled, <WH7997> they have slept <WH5123> their sleep: <WH8142> and none <WH3808> of the men <WH582> of might <WH2428> have found <WH4672> their hands. <WH3027>
At your rebuke, <WH1606> O God <WH430> of Jacob, <WH3290> both the chariot <WH7393> and horse <WH5483> are cast <WH7290> into a dead sleep. <WH7290>
You, even you, are to be feared: <WH3372> and who <WH4310> may stand <WH5975> in your sight <WH6440> when once <WH227> you are angry? <WH639>
You did cause judgment <WH1779> to be heard <WH8085> from heaven; <WH8064> the earth <WH776> feared, <WH3372> and was still, <WH8252>
When God <WH430> arose <WH6965> to judgment, <WH4941> to save <WH3467> all <WH3605> the meek <WH6035> of the earth. <WH776> Selah. <WH5542>
Surely <WH3588> the wrath <WH2534> of man <WH120> shall praise <WH3034> you: the remainder <WH7611> of wrath <WH2534> shall you restrain. <WH2296>
Vow, <WH5087> and pay <WH7999> to the LORD <WH3068> your God: <WH430> let all <WH3605> that be round <WH5439> about him bring <WH2986> presents <WH7862> to him that ought to be feared. <WH4172>
He shall cut <WH1219> off the spirit <WH7307> of princes: <WH5057> he is terrible <WH3372> to the kings <WH4428> of the earth. <WH776>
